blogPost.excerpt:
WATCH MORE → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGAaZmvZaF9gtsK1erpReLEv_kiofqr4w

When is the last time you have asked the people you care about how they are doing? Brandon, Chad, Fred and Channing open up the discussion talking about the sudden loss of friend and former NFL player Vincent Jackson and how he was found days after passing away. "Did anyone check on him?" Brandon poses the question which leads him into doing a mental check-in with all the guys. 

In a special moment of vulnerability and raw emotion, the guys are brought to tears as they sit and talk about deep life discussions. The guys talk about how there's a stigma in society that men and young boys are always raised to be tough and not show emotion or the world will look at you differently. With athletes, that notion is instilled by coaches and teammates saying tears are a sign of weakness when in fact it shouldn't be viewed that way. Being strong is part of dealing with emotions and being able to share with others what's truly going on inside your mind and heart. 

After recently losing his mother Hurricane Paula Johnson, Chad opens up about their relationship and how he's struggled with the emotions tied to loss. Recounting the memories and leading up to her final days, Chad is very transparent that the relationship was unique in many factors but he wouldn't have had it any other way. “It hurts to lose the person responsible for who I am,” Chad says, as he breaks down which brings Brandon and Channing to tears too. Fred follows it up saying that sometimes things in life are bigger than sports and different from what people portray on the outside, we all go through things and it's ok to let that emotion out. 

After a group hug of comfort and reassurance, Chef Nancie comes out and opens up about tragically losing her brother years ago and how the pain never fades but the good memories help make it easier to cope. 

I Am Athlete Movie Posters Available now on houseofathlete.com! 

Special Thanks to Botaniko Weston for providing us a location to film the episode. 

FOLLOW US ON:
Instagram | https://instagram.com/iamathletepodcast
Twitter | https://twitter.com/IAMATHLETEpod
Website | https://houseofathlete.com

#IAMATHLETE
#BrandonMarshall
#ChadJohnson
blogPost.body:
WATCH MORE → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGAaZmvZaF9gtsK1erpReLEv_kiofqr4w

Brandon, Chad, Fred and Channing open up the discussion talking about the sudden loss of friend and former NFL player Vincent Jackson and how he was found days after passing away. "Did anyone check on him?" Brandon poses the question which leads him into doing a mental check-in with all the guys. 

In a special moment of vulnerability and raw emotion, the guys are brought to tears as they sit and talk about deep life discussions. The guys talk about how there's a stigma in society that men and young boys are always raised to be tough and not show emotion or the world will look at you differently. With athletes, that notion is instilled by coaches and teammates saying tears are a sign of weakness when in fact it shouldn't be viewed that way. Being strong is part of dealing with emotions and being able to share with others what's truly going on inside your mind and heart. 

After recently losing his mother Hurricane Paula Johnson, Chad opens up about their relationship and how he's struggled with the emotions tied to loss. Recounting the memories and leading up to her final days, Chad is very transparent that the relationship was unique in many factors but he wouldn't have had it any other way. “It hurts to lose the person responsible for who I am,” Chad says, as he breaks down which brings Brandon and Channing to tears too. blogPost.title: Ocho Breaks Down: Real Men Cry Too | I AM ATHLETE with Brandon Marshall, Chad Johnson & More
blogPost.author: I AM ATHLETE

localize.title: 奥乔崩溃了。真男人也会哭｜I AM ATHLETE与布兰登-马歇尔、查德-约翰逊及更多的人。
localize.description:
查看更多 → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGAaZmvZaF9gtsK1erpReLEv_kiofqr4w

你最后一次问你关心的人的情况是什么时候？布兰登、查德、弗雷德和钱宁展开讨论，谈到朋友、前NFL球员文森特-杰克逊的突然离世，以及他是如何在去世几天后被发现的。"有人检查过他吗？" 布兰登提出了这个问题，这导致他与所有的人做了一个心理检查。

在一个特殊的脆弱和原始情感的时刻，伙计们被带到了泪水中，他们坐在一起，谈论着深层次的生活讨论。大伙儿谈到，社会上有一种成见，男人和小男孩总是被教育成要强硬，不要表现出情感，否则世界会对你另眼相看。对于运动员来说，这种观念是由教练和队友灌输的，说眼泪是软弱的表现，其实不应该这么看。坚强是处理情绪的一部分，能够与他人分享你内心真正的想法和心事。

在最近失去了他的母亲飓风宝拉-约翰逊之后，查德公开了他们之间的关系，以及他如何与失去母亲的情绪作斗争。回顾记忆和导致她最后的日子，乍得非常透明，这种关系在许多因素中都是独特的，但他不会有任何其他方式。乍得说："失去对我的身份负责的人很痛苦。"他崩溃了，这让布兰登和钱宁也流泪了。弗雷德紧接着说，有时候生活中的事情比运动更重要，和人们在外面描绘的不一样，我们都会经历一些事情，把这种情绪发泄出来也是可以的。

在集体拥抱安慰和安慰之后，大厨南西出来开诚布公地讲述了多年前不幸失去哥哥的经历，痛苦永远不会消失，但美好的回忆有助于让人更容易应对。

我是运动员》电影海报现已登陆houseofathlete.com! 

特别感谢Botaniko Weston为我们提供了一个拍摄地点。

关注我们。
Instagram | https://instagram.com/iamathletepodcast
Twitter | https://twitter.com/IAMATHLETEpod
网站｜https://houseofathlete.com

#IAMATHLETE
#BrandonMarshall
#ChadJohnson

localize.title: 奧喬崩潰了。真男人也會哭｜I AM ATHLETE與布蘭登-馬歇爾、查德-約翰遜及更多的人。
localize.description:
查看更多 → https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGAaZmvZaF9gtsK1erpReLEv_kiofqr4w

你最後一次問你關心的人的情況是什麼時候？布蘭登、查德、弗雷德和錢寧展開討論，談到朋友、前NFL球員文森特-傑克遜的突然離世，以及他是如何在去世幾天後被發現的。"有人檢查過他嗎？" 布蘭登提出了這個問題，這導致他與所有的人做了一個心理檢查。

在一個特殊的脆弱和原始情感的時刻，夥計們被帶到了淚水中，他們坐在一起，談論着深層次的生活討論。大夥兒談到，社會上有一種成見，男人和小男孩總是被教育成要強硬，不要表現出情感，否則世界會對你另眼相看。對於運動員來說，這種觀念是由教練和隊友灌輸的，說眼淚是軟弱的表現，其實不應該這麼看。堅強是處理情緒的一部分，能夠與他人分享你內心真正的想法和心事。

在最近失去了他的母親颶風寶拉-約翰遜之後，查德公開了他們之間的關係，以及他如何與失去母親的情緒作鬥爭。回顧記憶和導致她最後的日子，乍得非常透明，這種關係在許多因素中都是獨特的，但他不會有任何其他方式。乍得說："失去對我的身份負責的人很痛苦。"他崩潰了，這讓布蘭登和錢寧也流淚了。弗雷德緊接着說，有時候生活中的事情比運動更重要，和人們在外面描繪的不一樣，我們都會經歷一些事情，把這種情緒發泄出來也是可以的。

在集體擁抱安慰和安慰之後，大廚南西出來開誠佈公地講述了多年前不幸失去哥哥的經歷，痛苦永遠不會消失，但美好的回憶有助於讓人更容易應對。

我是運動員》電影海報現已登陸houseofathlete.com! 

特別感謝Botaniko Weston爲我們提供了一個拍攝地點。

關注我們。
Instagram | https://instagram.com/iamathletepodcast
Twitter | https://twitter.com/IAMATHLETEpod
網站｜https://houseofathlete.com

#IAMATHLETE
#BrandonMarshall
#ChadJohnson

Kenzie Wheeler performs Keith Whitley's "Don't Close Your Eyes" during The Voice Blind Auditions.

» The Voice Premieres Monday, March 1st 8/7c on NBC!

THE VOICE ON SOCIAL:
Like The Voice: http://Facebook.com/NBCTheVoice
Follow The Voice: https://Twitter.com/NBCTheVoice
Follow The Voice on Instagram: https://instagram.com/nbcthevoice/

#TheVoice #TheVoiceBlindAuditions #TheVoice2021 #KenzieWheeler #KeithWhitley #DontCloseYourEyes #NBC #Music #Highlight #BlakeShelton #JohnLegend #KellyClarkson #NickJonas

NBC’s The Voice follows the strongest vocalists from across the country and invites them to compete in this season's blockbuster vocal competition.

Find The Voice trailers, full episode highlights, previews, promos, clips, and digital exclusives here.

NBC ON SOCIAL:
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/nbc
Twitter: http://Twitter.com/NBC
Facebook: http://Facebook.com/NBC
Instagram: http://instagram.com/nbc

ABOUT THE VOICE
The four-time Emmy Award-winning musical competition series “The Voice” returns with the strongest vocalists from across the country invited to compete in the show’s newest season. Pop music sensation Nick Jonas reclaims his red chair alongside superstar returning coaches Kelly Clarkson, John Legend, and Blake Shelton for Season 20. Carson Daly returns as host. The show’s innovative format features four stages of competition: the Blind Auditions, the Battle Rounds, Knockouts, and the Live Performance Shows. During the Blind Auditions, the decisions from the musician coaches are based solely on voice and not looks. If a coach is impressed by the artist’s voice, he/she pushes a button to select the artist for his/her team. The singers with the lowest number of votes will be sent home each week. In the end, one will be named “The Voice” and will receive the grand prize of a recording contract. Stream Now on the NBC App!

Kenzie Wheeler's Four-Chair Turn Performance: "Don't Close Your Eyes" - Voice Blind Auditions 2021
https://youtu.be/5bFfeiVrE_I

The Voice
http://www.youtube.com/user/nbcthevoice

#TheVoice #TheVoiceBlindAuditions #TheVoice2021 #KenzieWheeler #KeithWhitley #DontCloseYourEyes #NBC #Music #Highlight #BlakeShelton #JohnLegend #KellyClarkson #NickJonas#

NBC的《The Voice》追踪了全国各地最强的歌手，并邀请他们参加本季的声乐大比拼。

在这里找到The Voice的预告片、全集集锦、预告、宣传片、剪辑和数字独家。

NBC ON SOCIAL:
YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/nbc
Twitter: http://Twitter.com/NBC
Facebook: http://Facebook.com/NBC
Instagram: http://instagram.com/nbc

关于声音
四次获得艾美奖的音乐竞赛系列节目《The Voice》再度回归，来自全国各地的最强歌手受邀参加最新一季节目的角逐。流行音乐巨星尼克-乔纳斯（Nick Jonas）重新坐上红椅子，与超级明星回归教练凯利-克拉克森（Kelly Clarkson）、约翰-传奇（John Legend）和布莱克-谢尔顿（Blake Shelton）一起参加第20季的比赛。卡森-戴利回归主持。节目的创新形式包括四个阶段的比赛：盲选、战圈、淘汰赛和现场表演秀。在盲选赛中，音乐人教练的决定完全基于声音而非外表。如果教练被歌手的声音所打动，他/她就会按下按钮选择歌手加入他/她的团队。每周得票最少的歌手将被送回家。最终，有一位歌手将被评为 "The Voice"，并将获得唱片合约的大奖。现在就在NBC App上播放

Kenzie Wheeler的四把椅子转身表演。"别闭眼"，2021年声乐盲选赛。
https://youtu.be/5bFfeiVrE_I

声音
http://www.youtube.com/user/nbcthevoice

關於聲音
四次獲得艾美獎的音樂競賽系列節目《The Voice》再度迴歸，來自全國各地的最強歌手受邀參加最新一季節目的角逐。流行音樂巨星尼克-喬納斯（Nick Jonas）重新坐上紅椅子，與超級明星迴歸教練凱利-克拉克森（Kelly Clarkson）、約翰-傳奇（John Legend）和布萊克-謝爾頓（Blake Shelton）一起參加第20季的比賽。卡森-戴利迴歸主持。節目的創新形式包括四個階段的比賽：盲選、戰圈、淘汰賽和現場表演秀。在盲選賽中，音樂人教練的決定完全基於聲音而非外表。如果教練被歌手的聲音所打動，他/她就會按下按鈕選擇歌手加入他/她的團隊。每週得票最少的歌手將被送回家。最終，有一位歌手將被評爲 "The Voice"，並將獲得唱片合約的大獎。現在就在NBC App上播放
